**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This polished wooden staff bears a swirling motif reminiscent of the folds of a brain. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify mental magic. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells. Mentalist's Staff **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 90 gp ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1482)
  • **1st** [_mindlink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603), [_phantom pain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1632)
Mentalist's Staff (Greater) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 460 gp ---
  • **2nd** [_paranoia_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1623)
  • **3rd** [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1563), phantom pain
Mentalist's Staff (Major) **Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 279 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Price** 1,800 gp ---
  • **4th** [_rewrite memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1655), [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1719)
  • **5th** [_hallucination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1551), phantom pain, [_synaptic pulse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1710)
name: Mentalist's Staff (Major)
